segments.text: Oh, what a clever pair those children are!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm watching the little boy, he's a true strategist with those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's managed to get himself up on that stool, despite its wobbliness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And he's reaching right into the cookie jar, a true master of stealth.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is waiting patiently, hand extended for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s such a classic scene of childhood mischief playing out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The way they're so focused on their sweet prize is just adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm actually quite impressed by their teamwork, even if it's for forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman at the sink is completely absorbed in her task, oblivious to their raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s almost comical how unaware she is of the delicious rebellion behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope that stool holds up long enough for them to achieve their goal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They'll have a great story to tell later, or at least a full tummy.
segments.speaker: PAR
